text: Institut supérieur international du parfum, de la cosmétique et de l'aromatique alimentaire (ISIPCA) is a renowned graduate cosmetics school in France. It is in a campus of the Université de Versailles Saint-Quentin-en- Yvelines (Northern France).ISIPCA: 40ÈME ANNIVERSAIRE Its different curricula lead to the following French & European degrees : * Bachelor of Science * Master of Science * Mastères Spécialisés (MS)Sécurité et réglementation internationale des parfums et produits cosmétiques (ESCOM) * Massive Online Open Course.Institut Supérieur International du Parfum, de la Cosmétique Academic activities and industrial applied research are performed mainly in French and English languages. == Research labs == Research activities at ISIPCA relate to the following topics: * Perfume * Cosmetics * Flavor == References == == Further reading == * Official website Category:Technical colleges and universities in France Category:1970 establishments in France Category:Versailles
title: ISIPCA
